extends java.lang.Object
    Db. Powerful database query and update tool box.

      • queryFirst

        public static <T> T queryFirst(java.lang.String sql,
                               java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute sql query and return the first result. I recommend add "limit 1" in your sql.
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        Object[] if your sql has select more than one column, and it return Object if your sql has select only one column.

      • queryFirst

        public static <T> T queryFirst(java.lang.String sql)
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement
        関連項目:
        queryFirst(String, Object...)

      • queryColumn

        public static <T> T queryColumn(java.lang.String sql,
                                java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute sql query just return one column.
        型パラメータ:
        T - the type of the column that in your sql's select statement
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        List

      • update

        public static int update(java.lang.String sql,
                         java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute update, insert or delete sql statement.
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        either the row count for INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, or 0 for SQL statements that return nothing

        パラメータ:

      • findById

        public static Record findById(java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.lang.Object idValue)
        Find record by id with default primary key. 
         Example:
 Record user = Db.findById("user", 15);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        idValue - the id value of the record

      • findById

        public static Record findById(java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.lang.String primaryKey,
                              java.lang.Object... idValue)
        Find record by id. 
         Example:
 Record user = Db.findById("user", "user_id", 123);
 Record userRole = Db.findById("user_role", "user_id, role_id", 123, 456);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        idValue - the id value of the record, it can be composite id values

      • deleteById

        public static boolean deleteById(java.lang.String tableName,
                                 java.lang.Object idValue)
        Delete record by id with default primary key. 
         Example:
 Db.deleteById("user", 15);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        idValue - the id value of the record
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • deleteById

        public static boolean deleteById(java.lang.String tableName,
                                 java.lang.String primaryKey,
                                 java.lang.Object... idValue)
        Delete record by id. 
         Example:
 Db.deleteById("user", "user_id", 15);
 Db.deleteById("user_role", "user_id, role_id", 123, 456);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        idValue - the id value of the record, it can be composite id values
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(java.lang.String tableName,
                             java.lang.String primaryKey,
                             Record record)
        Delete record. 
         Example:
 boolean succeed = Db.delete("user", "id", user);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the record
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • save

        public static boolean save(java.lang.String tableName,
                           java.lang.String primaryKey,
                           Record record)
        Save record. 
         Example:
 Record userRole = new Record().set("user_id", 123).set("role_id", 456);
 Db.save("user_role", "user_id, role_id", userRole);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the record will be saved
        true - if save succeed otherwise false

      • save

        public static boolean save(java.lang.String tableName,
                           Record record)
        関連項目:
        save(String, String, Record)

      • update

        public static boolean update(java.lang.String tableName,
                             java.lang.String primaryKey,
                             Record record)
        Update Record. 
         Example:
 Db.update("user_role", "user_id, role_id", record);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the Record save to
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the Record object
        true - if update succeed otherwise false

      • update

 Db.update("user", record);
